remarks: A relation equivalent to the existence of an onto mapping.  The right-hand ` f ` is not necessarily a function.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2007.)
statement:
exfo $p |- ( E. f f : A -onto-> B <-> E. f ( A. x e. A E! y e. B x f y /\ A. x e. B E. y e. A y f x ) ) $.
$d A f x y $.
$d B f x y $.
$d x y $.
